./bp_me/src/v/wormhole/bp_me_wormhole_packet_encode_lce_req.v Cov: 87.1% 

   1: /**
   2:  *  Name:
   3:  *    bp_me_wormhole_packet_encode_lce_req.v
   4:  *
   5:  *  Description:
   6:  *    It takes bp_lce_cce_req_s as a payload, parses, and forms it into a wormhole
   7:  *    packet that goes into the adapter.
   8:  *
   9:  *    packet = {payload, length, cord}
  10:  */
  11: 
  12: 
  13: module bp_me_wormhole_packet_encode_lce_req
  14:   import bp_common_pkg::*;
  15:   import bp_common_aviary_pkg::*;
  16:   #(parameter bp_cfg_e cfg_p = e_bp_inv_cfg
  17:     `declare_bp_proc_params(cfg_p)
  18:     `declare_bp_lce_cce_if_widths(num_cce_p, num_lce_p, paddr_width_p, lce_assoc_p, dword_width_p, cce_block_width_p)
  19: 
  20:     , localparam lce_cce_req_packet_width_lp = 
  21:         `bsg_wormhole_concentrator_packet_width(coh_noc_cord_width_p, coh_noc_len_width_p, coh_noc_cid_width_p, lce_cce_req_width_lp)
  22:     )
  23:    (input [lce_cce_req_width_lp-1:0]           payload_i
  24:     , output [lce_cce_req_packet_width_lp-1:0] packet_o
  25:     );
  26: 
  27:   `declare_bp_lce_cce_if(num_cce_p, num_lce_p, paddr_width_p, lce_assoc_p, dword_width_p, cce_block_width_p);
  28:   `declare_bsg_wormhole_concentrator_packet_s(coh_noc_cord_width_p, coh_noc_len_width_p, coh_noc_cid_width_p, lce_cce_req_width_lp, lce_cce_req_packet_s);
  29: 
  30:   bp_lce_cce_req_s payload_cast_i;
  31:   lce_cce_req_packet_s packet_cast_o;
  32:   assign payload_cast_i = payload_i;
  33:   assign packet_o = packet_cast_o;
  34: 
  35:   localparam lce_cce_req_req_len_lp =
  36:     `BSG_CDIV(lce_cce_req_packet_width_lp-$bits(payload_cast_i.msg.req.pad), coh_noc_flit_width_p) - 1;
  37:   localparam lce_cce_req_uc_wr_len_lp =
  38:     `BSG_CDIV(lce_cce_req_packet_width_lp, coh_noc_flit_width_p) - 1;
  39:   localparam lce_cce_req_uc_rd_len_lp =
  40:     `BSG_CDIV(lce_cce_req_packet_width_lp-$bits(payload_cast_i.msg.uc_req.data), coh_noc_flit_width_p) - 1;
  41: 
  42:   logic [coh_noc_cord_width_p-1:0] cce_cord_li;
  43:   logic [coh_noc_cid_width_p-1:0]  cce_cid_li;
  44:   bp_me_cce_id_to_cord
  45:    #(.cfg_p(cfg_p))
  46:    router_cord
  47:     (.cce_id_i(payload_cast_i.dst_id)
  48:      ,.cce_cord_o(cce_cord_li)
  49:      ,.cce_cid_o(cce_cid_li)
  50:      );
  51: 
  52:   always_comb begin
  53:     packet_cast_o.payload = payload_cast_i;
  54:     packet_cast_o.cid     = cce_cid_li;
  55:     packet_cast_o.cord    = cce_cord_li;
  56: 
  57:     case (payload_cast_i.msg_type)
  58:       e_lce_req_type_rd
  59:       ,e_lce_req_type_wr  : packet_cast_o.len = coh_noc_len_width_p'(lce_cce_req_req_len_lp);
  60:       e_lce_req_type_uc_rd: packet_cast_o.len = coh_noc_len_width_p'(lce_cce_req_uc_wr_len_lp);
  61:       e_lce_req_type_uc_wr: packet_cast_o.len = coh_noc_len_width_p'(lce_cce_req_uc_wr_len_lp);
  62:       default: packet_cast_o = '0;
  63:     endcase
  64:   end
  65: 
  66: endmodule
  67: 
  68:
